qas.question: Who moved the Oklahoma City Thunder to Oklahoma City?
What is one of the Thunders nicknames?

context: The Oklahoma City Thunder of the National Basketball Association (NBA) has called Oklahoma City home since the 2008–09 season, when owner <a0_0>Clayton Bennett<a0_0/> relocated the franchise from Seattle, Washington. The Thunder plays home games at the Chesapeake Energy Arena in downtown Oklahoma City, known affectionately in the national media as 'the Peake' and 'Loud City'. The Thunder is known by several nicknames, including "<a1_0>OKC<a1_0/> Thunder" and simply "OKC", and its mascot is Rumble the <a2_0>Bison<a2_0/>.
